project_descr: BRA/98/004 - Implementation of Brazilian TCDC Programmes and Projects

outputs.output_descr: This project aims to identify, negotiate, approve and monitor the development of TCDC programmes and projects with developing countries, following the policy guidance of the Ministry of External Relations. It is expected that those programmes lead to closer economical and political ties with collaborating countries, reflecting thus Brazil's priority to promote South-South cooperation.

project_title: bra/98/004-implem of brazilian tcdc progr and proj
